explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a man in a black short-sleeved shirt stands on a lawn facing forward, holding Captain America's shield in his left hand and Thor's hammer in his right. Trees and fences surround him, and English subtitles appear above.

[0-10] First, the man in the black short-sleeved shirt takes a step forward with the shield and then turns it over to show the back of the shield. The subtitles above change to "Unbreakable". Next, the man in the black short-sleeved shirt raises Thor's hammer in front of him, and the subtitles above change to a red "Vs". The man takes a step forward and rotates Thor's hammer in his hand. The subtitles above change to "Can break anything", and then disappear.
